Articles.Content: My game keeps on when i'm launching it, it keeps on loading slow, I tried deleting logs, I tried everything, but nothing works. Please help me!

Hi TheReporter, please see the stickied thread and provide your logs, addon list and dxdiag report, the stick explains what these are and how to do this.

Though this may be a known Unity3D bug, if you have any unused network devices or use hamachi, try disabling them.

Hi TheReporter, please see the stickied thread and provide your logs, addon list and dxdiag report, the stick explains what these are and how to do this.

Though this may be a known Unity3D bug, if you have any unused network devices or use hamachi, try disabling them.

I have no hamachi or something like that, It just all of a sudden just, slowed down. It seemed like hours, I kept it open, watching videos, AND STILL didn't work! I had deleted the logs, and I hadn't seen them or copied them so I couldn't have any logs to show, I sadly don't know what a dxdiag report is, so... I think I might be screwed.

- - - Updated - - -

Nevermind, it's solved. All I had to do is just take out all of my mods, and then put them back in. Good as new!

- - - Updated - - -

It wasn't that, it was instead all of those mods that I had in there. Hehe!
Glad you figured it out TheRocketeer
The problem that it was is that I had too many mods my KSP could handle.
